name: Chameleon (itch) (PatFagan)
description:
This game is another project that has been half-finished for far too long, that I wanted to scramble together to get it off of my To Do list.  

This one is a bit more polished than Diggy, and I learned just as much as I did on that project.  While working on Chameleon, I learned a lot about using bools and collider triggers together - the entire game is essentially made up of those two elements.  I also learned how to use pixel art in Tileset grids and how to animate a bit in Affinity.  

Now that I've learned a bit from these projects and from my new programming and game development classes, hopefully the next project will be complete for once.  

The plan is to keep is simple for that one so I can actually finish it with a main menu and a couple of levels.  It's going to be about a Lava Lamp making its way through the dark.
